short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AutoScribe - A personal assistant for clinicians.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AutoScribe uses state of the art machine learning to automatically generate a clinician's note during a live clinician-patient visit. There is a human scribe in the loop to correct the machine generated note so that clinicians can simply review and submit their final note.

Using the extension will enable our integration with the OSCAR EMR.

Please note that you need an account to use the system. To get set up, please visit https://signup.mutuohealth.com.
